name: European Network for Cyber Security
goal: ENCS is a non-profit organization with the mission to improve the cyber security of Europe's critical infrastructures. ENCS is owned by critical infrastructure owners, our members. It is embedded in a strong network of partners in academia, government, and industry. ENCS brings together security experts to offer applied research, training, advice, and testing to our members. Its focus is currently on electricity distribution grids, and the emerging smart grid.
interests: Digital economy and society, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Cybersecurity Strategy
Digital Single Market Strategy
Network & Information security Directive
Smart Grid Task Force Expert Group 2
Energy Expert Cyber Security Platform (EECSP) - Expert Group
contractual Public Private Partnership on cybersecurity
